question: some people think that the best way to run a business is within the family. What are the advantages and disadvanatages of a family run business
text: People have different perceptions on how to run a business smoothly. Some persons believe that the most effective method to continue a business is running it within the family members. The major advantage of this action is transition of knowledge and demerit is reduction in investments or in revenues. This essay will firstly discuss the positive impact and then secondly, outline the disadvantage.

To begin with, one of the merits of family business is transferring  knowledge to the future generation. When ancestors pass the valuable information on how to progress on the business in a competitive market and explain the strategies to follow, youngsters in the family  will acquire the best methodologies to compete, which enhance them to handle the business later. As a result, they can perform better and create profits as they are aware of the solutions to tackle the problems, that had occurred in the past. For example, many businesses which are handled by the family members, are able  to produce a constant growth through the possessed knowledge and efforts.

On the other hand, investments to buy items will be a constraint, if the family is not able to support the business financially. This means that, If the financial status of a family is not constant, then they will not be able to buy commodities which are required by  consumers. Besides, if the business could not bring fortune to the family, the wealth of the family will be in trouble. Consequently, loss of the business can bring debt and family people will struggle to meet the two ends. There are many exemplifications where families are ruined due to the lackof revenue from the business.

In conclusion, while there are a number of ways to run a business, majority of people prefer to run it within a family. This phenomenon has its own positive and negative impacts on the living style of people.
